name: Math
description: Explore the world of mathematics, from algebra to calculus.

name: Biology
description: Dive into the study of life, from cells to ecosystems.

name: Physics
description: Discover the fundamental laws of the universe and how things work.

name: Chemistry
description: Uncover the secrets of matter, molecules, and chemical reactions.

name: History
description: Journey through the past and learn about historical events and figures.

name: Computer Science
description: Learn programming, algorithms, and computer technology.

name: Art
description: Express your creativity through various art forms and techniques.

name: Music
description: Explore the world of music, from theory to composition.

name: English
description: Enhance your language skills and explore literature and writing.

name: Geography
description: Study the Earth, its landscapes, and global phenomena.
